p: HMPV epidemics occurred at the end of winter and spring in most temperate sites, but the timing of epidemics was more diverse in the tropics. The duration of epidemics was 4.8 months (4.4 to 5.1) [ 2]. In Mexico, from 2009 to 2018, the circulation of HMPV began in November and ended in April. Thus, the duration of the HMPV season was approximately six months.
